attributes.action: Launch a Public Inquiry into transphobia in the national media.
attributes.additional_details:
Transgender people are now exposed to significant hate.

On 27/06/19 the BBC revealed that recorded hate crimes against transgender people had increased by 81% since 2016/17.
 
Many news groups continue to allege that trans people are a risk to others, and misrepresent the law.
attributes.background: In 2017 the government launched a consultation into reform of the Gender Recognition Act 2004. This sparked an increase in media reporting that dehumanises trans people, undermines transgender communities, whips up hate, and prevents legal reform.
